verification_steps.action: 1. Test Nginx Rate Limiting Not Configured

test_payloads.description: Test payload for Nginx Rate Limiting Not Configured

implementation_steps.description: Implement protection for Nginx Rate Limiting Not Configured
implementation_steps.code:
limit_req_zone $binary_remote_addr zone=one:10m rate=1r/s;
limit_req zone=one burst=5 nodelay;

rollback_steps.description: Remove protection for Nginx Rate Limiting Not Configured

automated_checks.name: Nginx Rate Limiting Not Configured Check
automated_checks.failure_message: Nginx Rate Limiting Not Configured vulnerability detected
